title: "Sortable DataTable Dashboard from TSV "
format: html
include-after-body: datatables.js
# css: styles.css  # Optional custom CSS
---

```{python}
#| results: asis
#| label: roadmap
from IPython.display import HTML, display
import pandas as pd

# Read the TSV file (ensure 'data.tsv' is in the same directory)
df = pd.read_csv("data.tsv", sep="\t")

# Generate an HTML table with an id of "myTable"
html_table = df.to_html(index=False, table_id="myTable", border=0)

# Use display(HTML(...)) to output as a rich HTML object
display(HTML(html_table))
```

```{=html}
<!-- Include jQuery and DataTables from a CDN -->
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.datatables.net/2.2.2/js/dataTables.min.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.datatables.net/2.2.2/css/dataTables.dataTables.min.css"/>

<!-- Initialize DataTables for the generated table -->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function() {
    $('#myTable').DataTable({
      paging: true,    // Enable pagination
      searching: true  // Enable the search/filter feature
      // Sorting is enabled by default.
    });
  });
</script>
```
